00022 TimerManager * TimerManager::getInstance()
00023 {
00024     if( sInstance == NULL )
00025     {
00026         sInstance = new TimerManager;
00027         atexit( TimerManager::destroyInstance );
00028     }
00029     return sInstance;
00030 }

00060 void TimerManager::addListener
00061     (
00062     TimerListener * aListener
00063     )
00064 {
00065     getInstance()->instanceAddListener( aListener );
00066 }

00068 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 void TimerManager::instanceAddListener
00073     (
00074     TimerListener * aListener
00075     )
00076 {
00077     assert( aListener != NULL );
00078     mListeners.push_back( aListener );
00079 }
00080 
00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void TimerManager::removeListener

00093 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void TimerManager::instanceRemoveListener
00098     (
00099     TimerListener * aListener
00100     )
00101 {
00102     assert( aListener != NULL );
00103     mListeners.remove( aListener );
00104 }

00106 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void TimerManager::tick()
00112 {
00113     getInstance()->instanceTick();
00114 }
00115 
00116 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 void TimerManager::instanceTick()
00122 {
00123     std::list<TimerListener *>::iterator iter;
00124 
00125     for( iter = mListeners.begin(); iter != mListeners.end(); iter++ )
00126     {
00127         (*iter)->onTimer();
00128     }
00129 }
